name: Dank Theme for Scratch
description: Dankens (darkens and prettifies) the entirety of the Scratch Website. Make sure you install Scratch Forum Meme too, Dank extends it on the forums.
css: @-moz-document domain("scratch.mit.edu") { @font-face{font-family:"Source Sans Pro";font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local("Source Sans Pro Regular"),url(https://brick.a.ssl.fastly.net/fonts/sourcesanspro/400.woff) format("woff")}@font-face{font-family:"Source Sans Pro";font-style:normal;font-weight:600;src:local("Source Sans Pro Semibold"),url(https://brick.a.ssl.fastly.net/fonts/sourcesanspro/600.woff) format("woff")}@font-face{font-family:"Source Sans Pro";font-style:normal;font-weight:700;src:local("Source Sans Pro Bold"),url(https://brick.a.ssl.fastly.net/fonts/sourcesanspro/700.woff) format("woff")}@font-face{font-family:"Lato";font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local("Lato Semibold"),url(https://brick.a.ssl.fastly.net/fonts/lato/600.woff) format("woff")}::-moz-selection {  cursor: text;  color: #fff;  background: #f90;}::selection {  cursor: text;  color: #fff;  background: #f90;}.title,.huge,h1,h2,h3,#djangobbwrap .djangobb .button.new_topic,#djangobbwrap .djangobb #vf .box-head h4 span {  font-family: "Source Sans Pro", "helvetica neue", arial, sans-serif;  font-weight: 600;  color: #fff;}b {  font-weight: 600;}.body,body,h4,h5,h6,blockquote,small {  font-family: "Lato", "helvetica neue", arial, sans-serif;  font-weight: 400;  font-size: 1.1875rem;  line-height: 1.5;  -webkit-font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures;          font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures;  -webkit-font-feature-settings: "kern";          font-feature-settings: "kern";  -webkit-font-kerning: normal;          font-kerning: normal;  font-smoothing: antialiased;}p {  font-size: 1.3rem;}blockquote {  margin-left: 0;  padding-left: 24px;  border-left: 4px solid #eee;}.mono,code,pre {  font-family: "Inconsolata", monospace;}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,#djangobbwrap .djangobb .button.new_topic,#djangobbwrap .djangobb #vf .box-head h4 span {  font-weight: 400;  color: #fff;  margin-top: 1em;  margin-bottom: 0.3em;  margin: 0;}.comments textarea .comments-on textarea {  padding: 0.5em;  border: 2px solid rgba(106,106,104,0.2);}.comments textarea .comments-on #comments-loading span {  visibility: hidden;}h1 {  font-size: 54px;  line-height: 1.25em;  font-weight: 600;}h1 b {  font-weight: 800;}h2,#djangobbwrap .djangobb #vf .box-head h4 span {  font-size: 38px;  line-height: 1.2em;}h3,#djangobbwrap .djangobb .button.new_topic {  font-size: 36px;  line-height: 1.15em;}h4 {  font-size: 1.125em;  line-height: 1.1em;}h5,blockquote {  font-size: 1.2rem !important;  line-height: 1.4em;}h6,small {  font-size: 0.8rem;  line-height: 1.2em;}a {  color: #25aff4;  cursor: pointer;  text-decoration: none;  font-weight: 600;}a a:hover {  color: inherit;}body #navigation {  border-bottom: none;  background-color: /*[[navbar-color]]*/;}body #navigation .logo a {  -webkit-transition:none;  transition: none;  background-size: 81px !important;}body #navigation .link a span {  font-weight: 400;  font-size: 14px;}body #navigation .mystuff > a,body #navigation .messages > a {  background-size: 24px !important;}body {  height: auto;  min-height: 100%;}body .avatar img {  border-radius: 3px;}body #content {  padding-top: 6em;}body .container {  width: 90%;  max-width: 1200px;}body #topnav {  box-shadow: none;  height: 51px;  -webkit-user-select: none;     -moz-user-select: none;      -ms-user-select: none;          user-select: none;  position: fixed;  box-shadow: 0 0 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);}body #topnav *,body #topnav .user-nav li a,body #topnav .user-nav li form input {  font-family: "Source Sans Pro", "helvetica neue", arial, sans-serif;}body #topnav .user-nav li a {  background-color: transparent !important;  color: #fff !important;  font-family: "Source Sans Pro", "helvetica neue", arial, sans-serif;}body #topnav .innerwrap {  height: 100%;  background-color: /*[[navbar-color]]*/;}body #topnav .innerwrap .container {  height: span {  display: none;}body #topnav .innerwrap .account-nav {  margin: 0;  height: 51px;}body #topnav .innerwrap .account-nav .logged-in-user.open {  background-color: transparent !important;}body 20px;}body #topnav form.search .glass {  position: absolute;  background-color: transparent;  background-image: url("https://scratch.mit.edu/images/nav-search-glass.png");  background-repeat: #search-input {  -webkit-transition:0.15s ease background-color;  transition: 0.15s ease background-color;  padding: 0;  padding-right: 10px;  padding-left: 40px;  height: 40px;  color: #fff;  font-size: 14px;  outline: none;  display: inline-block;  margin: 0.5em 0;  margin-top: 5px;  box-shadow: none;  border: none;  background-color: rgba(21,21,21,0.1);  border-radius: 5px;  width: 147.281px;  -webkit-box-flex: 0;  -webkit-flex-grow: 0;      -ms-flex-positive: 0;          flex-grow: 0;}body #topnav form.search #search-input:focus {  background-color: rgba(21,21,21,0.2);}body :-ms-input-placeholder {  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.75);}body #topnav form.search ::placeholder {  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.75);}body {  background: #151515;  color: #fff;  font-family: "Lato", none;  -webkit-transition:150ms;  transition: 150ms;}body .button,body .button.small {  height: initial;  width: initial;  border-radius: 3px;  color: #25aff4;  font-weight: 600;  text-transform: #comments .comments li .info .name {  line-height: 16px;}body #comments .comments li .info .name a {  color: #f90;  font-weight: 400;  font-size: 110%;}body #comments .comments li .actions-wrap {
